game.name: Adventure Paws
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Adventure Paws is a pixel-style 2D side-scrolling adventure game where you and your friend will play as two cats, embarking on an exciting journey across a mysterious and unknown continent. Join the black and white cats and set off on this journey full of challenges and surprises!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Adventure Paws is a pixel-style 2D side-scrolling adventure game where you and your friend will play as two cats, embarking on an exciting journey across a mysterious and unknown continent. Join the black and white cats and set off on this journey full of challenges and surprises!
